text: [Music]
I'm GP I'm the CEO and founder of stack
armor we provide cloud compliance and
security solutions we've been helping
customers for the past three years in
the public sector financial services and
the health care markets move their
applications and making sure that we
meet all of the regulatory requirements
such as HIPAA NIST
Fred ramp and FISMA requirements really
the big benefit that we see is our
ability to help our customers save money
we have really been successful in being
able to very quickly find and provision
software that's available on the AWS
marketplace if you compare that whole
process end-to-end that might have taken
two weeks that takes us now two minutes
not only that once I have gone in and
selected the software that I like there
are other additional services for
example the AWS Service Catalog
is a wonderful way for us to be able to
implement security governance and easy
availability developers love to be
creative but a lot of times you give
them too many tools it can create a
little bit chaos with an AWS we're
allowed to basically choose pick and
choose and say you guys are allowed to
develop using these widgets and for our
IT governance and risk framework it's
perfect so we know that we've got
something that we've have reviewed
auditive and in that controlled
environment be able to let them be
creative within the box that we pick AWS
marketplace along with the AWS Service
Catalog allows enterprise customers a
lot of freedom and flexibility and also

highly streamlined service with their
tools their documentation and everything
they provide at your fingertips so
inherently we are able to take in
to that so instead of dealing with
equipment or having to wait for things
to come in the door we know that all
this stuff is really available online
stack armor is a born in the cloud
solutions provider that helps customers
migrate their applications onto AWS
increasingly what we're finding is it
doesn't stop there because the customer
is really looking for speed security and
simplification many times the customer
will come to us and say hey you're
helping us migrate this application I
need a particular kind of a security
service or I need some kind of a data
cleansing software ETL solution and
things of that nature
we just find it to be extremely fast to
be able to go and point them to the AWS
marketplace where they can go in and
find this vast selection of software
select the versions that they want and
then provision it our customers are
expecting us to take on this new role
that has been traditionally played by a
value-added reseller and that's led to
an interesting change in our business
model where we are now a one-stop
trusted source of cloud services to our
customers
